channel.title: How do i add solvefrog to my script?
channel.description:
how do i add solvefrog to my script because when i add it some error comes out.
Line 546: [Error] (19163:1): Assignment expected in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\Scripts\perfect_edgy.scar
what do i need to add so it can work?
frogs make me mad >.<

item.title: How do i add solvefrog to my script?
item.dc:creator: @esteban801 esteban801
item.description:
@esteban801 wrote:

awsome guys thx for all ur help am at school atm but i will try everything u guys tell me to do as soon i get home… yesterday my script had problems tho it didnt want to find the snadwich lady =( so my guy got pooned 3 times by her lolz. and by wat cheesechunk said i think that will be able to solve the sandwich problem… another thing… why did my scrpit find rick,pirate and dwarf as fighting randoms?? it never talked to them when they appeared… maybe what cheesechunk said will help that too… but well lets hope everything works =)

thx again guys… (if any problems i will post that here)

item.source: How do i add solvefrog to my script?

item.title: How do i add solvefrog to my script?
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

[quote=“Ron, post:8, topic:46432”][quote author=yakman link=topic=64640.msg761545#msg761545 date=1168575078]
the SRL FindNormalRandoms calls solve frog, just call FindNormalRandoms;
and make sure you set the player nick
[/quote]
It does? Hey Yakman, what doesn’t FindNormalRandoms solve? The name sounds like it leaves several randoms out.[/quote]
It only leaves out FindFight (Finghting scripts,) the skill related randoms, (Mining Randoms, etc…) and InBlack (Cannot be used inside dugeons and stuff…) FindNormalRandoms; can take like 400 MS though, thats why I use stuff from scripts Like Dankness’s. I suggest using FTWait(1) for your waits where possible. That will wait 200-250 MS, and calls FindTalk. FindTalk need to be called about 2 times a second, (I think thats it…) because those randoms can easily be missed. Just try to call FindNormalRandoms; about every 5 seconds…

Read full topic

item.title: How do i add solvefrog to my script?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Hmm… perhaps something to do with SolveFrog. You might wanna bring the SolveFrog function into your script and rename it as SolveFrog2, and try to tweak it so it works with your script.

But no, sorry I can’t explain it. If my last suggestion is bad or something, try to ask on the main SRL forums. The website is www.villu-reborn.com.

item.source: How do i add solvefrog to my script?

item.title: How do i add solvefrog to my script?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

I think I found your problem.

frog solvefrog
I'm pretty sure there is no function/procedure called frog.

If erasing that doesn’t work or it really is a function/procedure. Then make sure it’s not a semicolon problem. Make sure to end all your statements and call to procedures/functions with a semicolon - ;

A lot of people don’t bother with those everytime, and sometimes a command needs them. Try it, it may work.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add solvefrog to my script?

item.title: How do i add solvefrog to my script?
item.dc:creator: @esteban801 esteban801
item.description:
@esteban801 wrote:

it wont let me post the whole script but this is the part of the antirandoms

procedure randoms;
begin
findnormalrandoms;
ent;
findhead;
makecompass(‘n’)
findhead
makecompass(‘n’)
attachhead;
findtalk
talktorand;
clicktocontinue;
solvesandwich;
openbox
solvebox
frog
solvefrog
if(infight = true)then
if(findfight)then
begin
if(findcolorspiral(x,y,mmtree,637, 29,667, 54))then
begin
mouse(x,y-6,1,1,true)
wait(5000)
if(findcolorspiral(x,y,mmtree,637, 116,664, 142))then
mouse(x,y+9,1,1,true)
end else
begin
if(findcolorspiral(x,y,mmtree,637, 116,664, 142))then
begin
mouse(x,y-6,1,1,true)
wait(5000)
if(findcolorspiral(x,y,mmtree,637, 29,667, 54))then
mouse(x,y+6,1,1,true)
if(findcolorspiral(x,y,1255464,0,0,700,700))then
mouse(x,y,1,1,true)
end;
end;
if ((FindDead) or (FindMod) or (FindMime) or (FindMaze) or (FindQuiz))then
killscript(1)
end;
SRLRandomsReport;

if u can help me add more antirandoms than that that would be helpfull thx.

Read full topic
